Description: DescriptionEmployment Hero is an Australian tech unicorn - valued at over $1.25 billion.Our world-class software is the easiest way for small and medium-sized businesses to manage HR, payroll, employee engagement, and benefits. Weve grown 100% year-on-year since our inception in 2014, and now service over 90,000 businesses and 850,000+ active users globally. We have exciting growth plans for 2023 and beyond, powered by our mission of making employment easier and more valuable for everyone.We take a Remote First approach with our team. Employment Hero can hire across the world, so long as candidates have eligible working rights and are in a suitable timezone to their colleagues. If youve got the skills for the role and the passion for our mission then we want to hear from you!About The Lead Data Scientist JobEmployment Hero is continuing to innovate and grow, and have now opened a new opportunity for a Lead Data Scientist who can join us and be foundational in establishing... a Data Science function.As our Lead Data Scientist, you will leverage our wealth of data gained through our broad Human Resources and Employee Experience products, developing new Machine Learning (ML) models, building advanced analytics and insights, whilst growing and developing a team of data professionals.Youll have an impressive challenge ahead of you, where youll provide sophisticated insights and intelligence, including for commercial use cases to our sales, marketing and product teams on customer trends and opportunities, and also to inform and build products for our clients where we can continue to make employment easier for small and medium sized businesses around the world.Were moving fast, and often build the plane while flying, were looking for someone who isnt afraid to start running from day 1.Some Of Your Responsibilities Will Includeâ€¢ Design, develop, maintain and manage our data warehouses /data lakeâ€¢ Build advanced Machine Learning / Analytics modelsâ€¢ Work with our product and engineering teams to use your ML initiatives, including developing productsâ€¢ Be our data steward - own our governance, be a data security evangelistâ€¢ Coach, mentor and develop a small team of Data Analysts in Data Scienceâ€¢ Provide advice and work directly with our Chief Product and Technology Officer (CPTO) to scale the data function into the futureAbout Your Experience, Skills And Abilitiesâ€¢ Experienced as a Lead or Senior Data Scientist within a product lead technology business, including experience in ML for revenue generationâ€¢ Deep hands-on experience with creating Machine Learning models from scratch and getting them into productionâ€¢ A passion for and confidence in Data Governance and stewardshipâ€¢ An experience or desire to manage and develop a teamâ€¢ Solid ability to code in Python, SQL, RNice To Haves But Not Essentialâ€¢ Masters or PhD in a relevant fieldâ€¢ Experience with ETL or systems integration projectsSome Of Our Benefitsâ€¢ This is a fully remote position for anyone within Vietnam, we provide your laptop and other equipment to get you set up, plus an allowance for other items to get your desk readyâ€¢ We have flexible working time - as most of our developers are based in Vietnam youll be working local business hours, Monday to Fridayâ€¢ Fully compliant with the Vietnam Labor Code, with Social Security based on full salaryâ€¢ 20 days vacation leave, plus 1 Leisure Rules day a yearâ€¢ Private healthcare package for you (plus spouse + children)â€¢ Budgets towards continuing your learning and other generous allowancesâ€¢ International annual company conference (Last conference we went to Phuket, Thailand!)â€¢ Refer friends to open jobs and receive a cash bonus for every successful referral you makeâ€¢ Participate in our Employee Share Options Program - youll be a part owner of Employment HeroWe celebrate diverse perspectives and experiences, and we celebrate and invite people of all backgrounds and identities to apply for this position.Why join Employment Heroâ€¢ Raised $181M achieving unicorn status in February 2022â€¢ LinkedIn Top 25 Startups 2021, ranked #2 in Australiaâ€¢ The Australian Top 100 Innovators List 2021â€¢ Raised $140M Series E round led by Insight Partners July 2021â€¢ Raised $45M Series D round led by Seek 2021â€¢ Deloitte Technology Fast 50 2020, ranked #42 in Australiaâ€¢ LinkedIn Top 10 Startups 2020â€¢ Raised $22M Series C Round led by Seek July 2019â€¢ Raised $8 mill series B round led by Seek and OneVenturesâ€¢ Deloitte Technology Fast 50 2019, ranked #20 in Australiaâ€¢ GetApp Category Leader Q1 2019â€¢ Deloitte Technology Fast 50 2018, ranked #12 in Australiaâ€¢ HRD Gold Medalist - Human Capital Management Systems 2018â€¢ HRD Gold Medalist - Rewards and Recognition Service Provider 2018â€¢ HRD Rewards and Recognition Employer of Choice 2018â€¢ LinkedIn Top 25 Startups 2018â€¢ EY Entrepreneur of the Year National Finalist 2018#southeastasia

COMPANY & PRODUCT12iD is a venture capital-backed Swedish startup, providing a global digital identity solution (inspired by Mobile Bank ID). We strive to solve financial inclusion, create a cross-border ecosystem and become the biggest and best solution provider for digital identity worldwide. It's bold, we know, that's why we are looking for an ambitious hands-on engineer that will buy our vision and embark on our journey!The solution eliminates regulation issues and authentication fraud by offering superior technology, a scalable business model, and simple functionality. We have recently closed our latest financing round, and have since then been growing our team. You will help us on any start-up's unique journey between a seed round and a Series A round. This is a rare opportunity to become part of the next exciting and promising Swedish tech startup, truly impacting your career and will allow you to help shape the future of the company!ABOUT THE ROLE12iD is looking for a... Machine Learning Engineer for our Kathmandu office position. Someone to support the current Machine Learning Engineer at the Sweden HQ, as well as to be able to work on the product individually. The nature of the role itself demands a flexible, innovative, high-on-logics and opportunistic professional, as well as able to perform under pressure and comfortably work towards deadlines in a Sprint structure set out by the Product Owner of 12iD.JOB RESPONSIBILITIESâ€¢ Write production-level codeâ€¢ Integrate ML solutions with different layers of the product (Backend + Edge)â€¢ Diagnose, and fix bugs and bottlenecks in performanceâ€¢ Develop ML pipelines for training & deploymentâ€¢ Develop and evaluate ML modelsThe role may develop over time.IDEAL REQUIREMENTSâ€¢ Bachelors degree or equivalent experienceâ€¢ 4+ years of Python, experience in Numpy, Pandas is an advantageâ€¢ 1+ years of experience with Machine Learning (PyTorch/Keras/Scikit-learn/OpenCV)â€¢ 1+ years of product development experience on a Linux-based platform (preferred)â€¢ A mature and formal approach to writing and speechâ€¢ Experience in Javascript is an advantage (preferred)â€¢ Knowledge of cloud-based solutions and architectures (preferred)â€¢ Have the proper equipment to perform the tasks set out (preferred)â€¢ Fluent in English (must)â€¢ Fluent in other languages (preferred)12iD seeks a professional with a mature, independent, killer-instinct attitude, ready to build the next unicorn together with the rest of the team! We're a creative, optimistic, and tech-savvy company, based in central Stockholm, Sweden. We prioritize culture, development and inclusion, as well as a self-starter personality

About FusemachinesFusemachines is a leading AI strategy, talent, and education services provider. Founded by Sameer Maskey Ph.D., Adjunct Associate Professor at Columbia University, Fusemachines has a core mission of democratizing AI. With a presence in 4 countries (Nepal, the United States, Canada, and the Dominican Republic and more than 250 full-time employees) Fusemachines seeks to bring its global expertise in AI to transform companies around the world.Qualification and Experienceâ€¢ Must have at least a bachelor's degree in Computer Science or similar.â€¢ Minimum 2 years of relevant work experience.Required skills/Competenciesâ€¢ Proficient in Basic Machine Learning concepts: algorithms, evaluation procedures, etc, and dealing with Common failure modes. Experienced in at least one area of application (E.g. CV, NLP, etc)â€¢ Has a sound knowledge of mathematical concepts like Linear Algebra, Probability and Statistics, Calculusâ€¢ Proficient in frameworks & libraries such as... Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-learn and a good grasp of at least one of Tensorflow or Pytorch. Familiar with Flask, FastAPI or Django, and some domain-specific tools (e.g: opencv, spacy, etc)â€¢ Good Grasp on programming language and concepts such as Python + OOP + SOLID, Data Structures and Algorithms, RESTful APIs, and familiar with Architecture Designâ€¢ Good Grasp of software tools and platforms such as git, conda, pip, jupyter, Docker, and at least one cloud platform like AWS/GCPâ€¢ Good grasp of a database such as SQL/NoSQLâ€¢ Has a good grasp of agile processes like Sprint and Kanbanâ€¢ Good Team Management, Communication, and Problem-Solving SkillsKey Responsibilitiesâ€¢ Develop AI applications to adhere to designs that support business requirements for internal and external clients.â€¢ Research and develop machine learning models and work on the whole ML pipeline: data collection, wrangling, pre-processing, model building, evaluation, and deploymentâ€¢ Perform data analysis to uncover insights that can be immediately actionable or can inform decisions around the ML process.â€¢ Take initiative and ownership in writing requirement specifications and design documents for a variety of development tasks including feature development, database design, and system integrations.â€¢ Preparation, drafting, and review of software documentation and project reports to meet internal and client requirements.â€¢ Orchestrate deployment, monitoring, and maintenance of ML applications as per requirement.â€¢ Lead one or more projects in different capacities (if required)â€¢ Guide other developers and help them (as required) to do their work and look for ways to improve overall team output.â€¢ Take on Leadership roles (e.g: Supervisorial) as required.Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status

Job Responsibilitiesâ€¢ Work on solution-crafting pre-defined business problems that require Data Science approaches.â€¢ Contribute to client sessions from conceptual framework to detailed design.â€¢ Formulate innovative solutions that best bridge any gaps between a clients requirements and standard system functionality.â€¢ Create polished, high quality deliverables on time.â€¢ Effectively communicate with subordinates, peers, superiors, and clients in a way that drives deliverables forward and maintains open communication lines.Key Skills and Qualificationsâ€¢ Bachelors degree, with a technical major, such as engineering or computer science.â€¢ Minimum of 2 years of proven experience in Machine learning/AI.â€¢ Strong problem-solving skills with an emphasis on product development, demonstrates curiosity.â€¢ Experience using languages such as R, Python and SQL to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.â€¢ Knowledge of a variety of machine learning algorithms (clustering... decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks.â€¢ Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications.â€¢ Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams.â€¢ A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniquesâ€¢ Experience working with and creating data architectures and data lake management

About Us :Docsumo is Document AI software that helps enterprises capture data and analyze customer documents. We convert documents such as invoices, ID cards, and bank statements into actionable data. We are working with clients such as PayU, Arbor and Hitachi and backed by Sequoia, Barclays, Techstars, and Better Capital.As a Machine Learning you will be working directly with the CTO to develop end to end API products for the US market in the information extraction domain.Responsibilities :â€¢ You will be designing and building systems that help Docsumo process visual data i.e. as PDF & images of documents.â€¢ You'll work in our Machine Intelligence team, a close-knit group of scientists and engineers who incubate new capabilities from whiteboard sketches all the way to finished apps.â€¢ You will get to learn the ins and outs of building core capabilities & API products that can scale globally.â€¢ Should have hands-on experience applying advanced statistical learning techniques to... different types of data.â€¢ Should be able to design, build and work with RESTful Web Services in JSON and XML formats. (Flask preferred)â€¢ Should follow Agile principles and processes including (but not limited to) standup meetings, sprints and retrospectives.Skills / Requirements :â€¢ Minimum 3+ years experience working in machine learning, text processing, data science, information retrieval, deep learning, natural language processing, text mining, regression, classification, etc.â€¢ Must have a full-time degree in Computer Science or similar (Statistics/Mathematics)â€¢ Working with OpenCV, TensorFlow and Kerasâ€¢ Working with Python: Numpy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Pandaâ€¢ Familiarity with Version Control tools such as Gitâ€¢ Theoretical and practical knowledge of SQL / NoSQL databases with hands-on experience in at least one database system.â€¢ Must be self-motivated, flexible, collaborative, with an eagerness to learn

Job-Title: Remote Senior Machine Learning Engineer Jobs
Description: A rapidly-growing company providing AI-enhanced nanomaterial synthesis solutions is looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer. (Django and/or Flask preferred)â€¢ Familiarity with Version Control tools such as Gitâ€¢ Agile principles and processes including (but not limited to) standup meetings, sprints and retrospectivesâ€¢ Theoretical and practical knowledge of SQL / NoSQL databases with hands-on experience in at least one database systemâ€¢ Must be self-motivated, flexible, collaborative, with an eagerness to learn

Job-Title: Volunteer / Internship in Nepal - Trainer Volunteers - BIG DATA /DATA...
Description: What is Data SciencePeople have tried to define data science for over a decade now, consisting of math and statistics, subject expertise (knowledge about the domain to abstract and calculate), and hacking skills. Essentially if you can do all three, you are already highly knowledgeable in the field of data science.Data science is a concept used to tackle big data and includes data cleansing, preparation, and analysis. A data scientist gathers data from multiple sources and applies machine learning, predictive analytics, and sentiment analysis to extract critical information from the collected data sets. They understand data from a business point of view and can provide accurate predictions and insights that can be used to power critical business decisions.Skills Required to Become a Data ScientistAnyone interested in building a strong career in this domain should gain critical skills in three departments: analytics, programming, and domain knowledge. Going one level deeper... the following skills will help you carve out a niche as a data scientist:â€¢ Strong knowledge of Python, SAS, R, Scalaâ€¢ Hands-on experience in SQL database codingâ€¢ Ability to work with unstructured data from various sources like video and social mediaâ€¢ Understand multiple analytical functionsâ€¢ Knowledge of machine learningWhat is a Data AnalyticsA data analyst is usually the person who can do basic descriptive statistics, visualize data, and communicate data points for conclusions. They must have a basic understanding of statistics, a perfect sense of databases, the ability to create new views, and the perception to visualize the data. Data analytics can be referred to as the necessary level of data science.Skills Required to Become a Data AnalystA data analyst should be able to take a specific question or topic, discuss what the data looks like, and represent that data to relevant stakeholders in the company. If youre looking to step into the role of a data analyst, you must gain these four key skills:â€¢ Knowledge of mathematical statisticsâ€¢ Fluent understanding of R and Pythonâ€¢ Data wranglingâ€¢ Understand PIG/ HIVEData Science vs. Data AnalyticsData science is an umbrella term that encompasses data analytics, data mining, machine learning, and several other related disciplines. While a data scientist is expected to forecast the future based on past patterns, data analysts extract meaningful insights from various data sources. A data scientist creates questions, while a data analyst finds answers to the existing set of questions.What is Machine LearningMachine learning can be defined as the practice of using algorithms to extract data, learn from it, and then forecast future trends for that topic. Traditional machine learning software is statistical analysis and predictive analysis that is used to spot patterns and catch hidden insights based on perceived data.A good example of machine learning implementation is Facebook. Facebooks machine learning algorithms gather behavioral information for every user on the social platform. Based on ones past behavior, the algorithm predicts interests and recommends articles and notifications on the news feed. Similarly, when Amazon recommends products, or when Netflix recommends movies based on past behaviors, machine learning is at work.Skills Required to Become a Machine Learning EngineerMachine learning is just a different perspective on statistics. The following are critical skills that can help you jumpstart your career in this fast-growing domain:â€¢ Expertise in computer fundamentalsâ€¢ In-depth knowledge of programming skillsâ€¢ Knowledge of probability and statisticsâ€¢ Data modeling and evaluation skillsData Science vs. Machine LearningBecause data science is a broad term for multiple disciplines, machine learning fits within data science. Machine learning uses various techniques, such as regression and supervised clustering. On the other hand, the data in data science may or may not evolve from a machine or a mechanical process. The main difference between the two is that data science as a broader term not only focuses on algorithms and statistics but also takes care of the entire data processing methodology.Source: QuoraData science can be seen as the incorporation of multiple parental disciplines, including data analytics, software engineering, data engineering, machine learning, predictive analytics, data analytics, and more. It includes retrieval, collection, ingestion, and transformation of large amounts of data, collectively known as big data. Data science is responsible for bringing structure to big data, searching for compelling patterns, and advising decision-makers to bring in the changes effectively to suit the business needs. Data analytics and machine learning are two of the many tools and processes that data science uses.Nepalese Diploma, Graduates & Undergraduates youths are very much in need of learning the knowledge & Skills of Python , BiG Data ,Data Science , Data Structre ,Data Analytics ,Data Analysis ,Machine Learning , AI ,GIS-RS and so on ,Therefore,We are inviting Potential Volunteers to come visit Nepal ,exchange cross culture ,experience Nepal Himalyas ,Pokhara ,Chitwan Lumbini and many more and please help our youths learning above said Data Science ,Machine Learning and so on .If you require further information ,we can do an online orientation interaction Meeting for further informations if required any .Why Nepal Why EcoHomeStay Nepal Volunteers Nepal is one of the most beautiful, culturally rich and welcoming country in the world. Nepal is very rich in diversity where temperature and culture differs every minutes of distance . It is home to Mount Everest, the birthplace of Lord Buddha, and an astonishingly beautiful and diverse landscape, ranging from the well-known peaks of the Himalayas to the low-lying regions of the Terai-Madesh. The Nepali people are as diverse as the geography, with over 70 languages or dialects and scores of traditional festivals celebrated throughout the year.However, Nepal is among the poorest and least developed countries in the world with low rates of literacy, high rates of poverty and a persistent gender imbalance. The government is frequently unable to provide adequate education and health facilities throughout the country and both urban and rural areas are forced to live without the necessary resources to promote the growth and development of their communities:â€¢ 42% of the population live below the poverty line on less than $240 a yearâ€¢ 15,000 orphans are living on Kathmandu's streetsâ€¢ 42% of the population of Nepal are unemployedâ€¢ 51% illiteracy rate throughout Nepalâ€¢ 2.5 doctors are available for each 100,000 inhabitantsâ€¢ 54% of Nepali children are malnourishedâ€¢ More than 80% population are engaged into Family Farming ( FAO )Our VISION, Mission ,Goals & Projects We envision contributing towards creating Jobs & reducing all types of Poverty, Preparedness of FMNs ( Futurist Mothers of Nepal ),conservation, Climate Change, Sustainable, Digital & More Organic Nepal. Our vision is to contribute toward United Nation's Sustainable Goals through FMN ( Futurist Mothers of Nepal ),SAF AgriTech, SAF Agri solution, SAF, SAF Food Tech, SAF Environment& Conservation Tech, SAF Fin Tech, SAF Medi Tech, SAF Media Tech, SAF Hospitality & Tourism Tech, EcoHomestay Nepal, PCRC -Red Panda Conservation & Research Center & more...We envision creating jobs and contributing to Nepal's Rural Sustainable Tourism, Poverty, Unemployment, Conservation and Climate change, carbon footprint, Food Safety & Food Scarcity, Environment, Public Health, Preparedness of FMNs and so on. Our vision is to contribute toward Organic Food, Cleaner, Greener, Digital and more Sustainable Organic Nepal.We believe in turning challenges into opportunities and we also believe that problem solving can be a Career, Job & business opportunity. Tourism helps flow Consumers & encourage Consumers in consuming Goods & Services. Therefore, Tourism is the key for every sector.Why Agropreneur's ,EcoHomeStay ,UFC, FMN,SAF Nepal VOLUNTEERS We seek to address the issues of environment, Climate Change, Preparedness & Financial Freedom of FMNs ( Futurist Mothers of Nepal ) ,Agriculture, Wild Lives, Conservation, Red Panda, Birds ,Forestation ,Organic,Technology,Farmers Market, Innovation ,Research, Youth & Women Empowering, Education & Children, Nutrition ,Waste Management ,Food & Public Health, Rural Development , Rural & Sustainable Tourism, literacy, poverty and gender imbalance by partnering with institutions, organizations & Individuals and ensuring that the progress made is sustainable. We also run a cross-cultural exchange program, Nepali language and cultural classes, Mentorship, Internship, Fellowship,OJT, Volunteering, Practicum, Research , Innovation , Workshop , Training , Meditation , Yoga , Organic Farm Stay and EcoHomeStay program in Nepal.Volunteering, Internship Research ,Innovation work in Nepal can be an extremely rewarding and life-changing experience. Your efforts can bring great changes in the lives of individual people and the wider community. This cannot be said enough. In the difficult times that Nepal is now facing post Pandemic Crisis, your contribution of time or resources is extremely valuable.We envision creating jobs and contributing to Nepal's Rural Sustainable Tourism, Poverty, Unemployment, Conservation and Climate change, carbon footprint, Food Safety & Food Scarcity, Environment, Public Health, Preparedness of FMNs and so on. Our vision is to contribute toward Organic Food, Cleaner, Greener, Digital and more Sustainable Organic Nepal.Why We are hiring Volunteers & Interns Our Vision,mission,Goal,Core Objectives are to help local farmers,Futurist Mothers of Nepal(FMNs ),youth entrepreneurs,grassroots people,reduce poverty,contribute to environment,climate change,waste,management,education,PublicHealth,employment,Technology ,Innovation ,Research ,Capacity building ,Marketing , Promotion ,Digitization ,Sustainability.Our finding is that main challenges are marketing , promotion ,branding , Also ,Our Local Nepalese Youths, Students,FMNs,Entrepreneurs,Farmers dream to learn these special skills by considering our Volunteers & Interns as their Mentors & apply these learning Methods- " by learning by doing " , Learning by Making Mistakes "We welcome international Volunteers & Interns to participate in these projects & our Nepal Volunteering Program so that Our Local Youths, Farmers,Futurist Mothers ,Entrepreneurs and International Volunteers will make a big team and learn from each others.What is included in internship/volunteeringAs a volunteer, you will receive an introduction that includes Nepali lessons and sightseeing, and we take you to your host family and workplace.Why volunteer/Internship with usâ€¢ As a volunteer /Intern you will have an amazing time with us as you:â€¢ Will engage in the ongoing development process of Nepalâ€¢ Develop your personal and life skillsâ€¢ Grow an understanding of the Nepali people, their language and cultureâ€¢ Take part in local festivals, and weddings, and visit small villagesâ€¢ Immerse yourself in the spectacular natural beauty and surroundings of NepalResponsibilities - The main responsibility shall be collaborating with our Local Youths,farmers,women groups, Entrepreneur's, and actively participate in the projects and Programs. Any of your skills can be of most value.Qualification - Any level of Degree or Education is fine, but the Volunteers should have interest and desire to learn and teach in a TeamworkJob Description - An online Orientation shall be provided through which we will be able to explain to you the specific job description. Please do not worry ! As we believe in Learning by doing & Learning by making Mistakes as well as Learning by Sharing.Fresher & Learners ! - If you are highly self-motivated with will power to take the challenge and learning by making mistakes and Learning by Doing then you can choose our Volunteer or Internship option for any role of your interest. Please contact us for further details about volunteer & Internship with us .Working Hours - This position requires flexible working hours so no hard rules apply. This is team work too so everyone shall have to remain happy with flexible and extra working hours and consider the work not as the work but Work as the Fun !Accommodation - We have our own and & our Members Family Farmers Homestay Houses almost in every Part of Nepal with Nepalese Normal single bedroom with clean blanket , bed sheet , pillow , mattress , common bathroom with shower ,Wi Fi internet , Electricity. If you need more Luxurious than this you have freedom to add but with your own money.Food -1 Tea & breakfast - Organic Green Tea /black tea and fresh Milk tea with Nepalese typical breakfast such as boiled egg potatoes ,bread chapati Bread ,chiura ,soup2.Lunch - Daal bhat sabji - Veg and Non Veg Lunch shall be provided with Nepalese typical food3.Dinner - Nepalese typical daal bhat ( Lentil Soup & Steam Rice )with veg or non veg shall be provided. If you need more than this you have full freedom to buy on your ownVisa & Others - Visa and others are your own responsibility .We shall assist you with the documentation and processing wherever neededArrival and OrientationOrientation begins on the morning of next day your arrival and covers everything you need to know for your volunteer program in Nepal  an introduction to Nepal, Nepalese customs, language training details, rules and expectations, safety, travel opportunities in Nepal, and an introduction to your project and placement. The orientation will also give you a chance to visit local temples, sample authentic Nepali food, meet other volunteers and swap contact details for weekend travel and socializing. The program may vary depending on your time of arrival. We will manage to include all below mentioned activities in you introduction program.â€¢ Arrival and introduction host familyâ€¢ Survival Nepali lessons and cultural discussionâ€¢ Local amenities and sightseeing and project startWe believe in turning challenges into opportunities and we also believe that problem solving can be a Career, Job & business opportunity. Tourism helps flow Consumers & encourage Consumers in consuming Goods & Services. Therefore, Tourism is the key for every sectors.Namaste Nepal! Naturally Nepal!, Once is not Enough !Rethink Nepal !Mission Statement - "Cleaner ,Greener ,Digital & More Sustainable Organic Nepal
